amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish a petition process under which affected businesses, individuals or other parties could petition Federal agencies to review and revise existing regulations or programs affecting human health, safety, or the environment which have compliance costs exceeding $25 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require agencies to implement, within one year of enactment of the bill, an accelerated process that would allow citizens to petition for reviews of existing regulations which cost more than $25 million annually.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barton amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 220 (Roll no. 179).
